0: This is Phoenix it was over 10F during my visit and I have a beg for a refrigerator so I can have a cold glass of water in the morning when I wake up
I gave up trying to stream one of my favorite TV shows and used the hotspot on my phone burning through tons of data in the process
My room was average and truly for 279 in Phoenix I expected a bit better
As has been noted in other reviews the guest rooms definitely need a refresh
For the price of the room vs the quality of the hotel it will be hard to attract repeat customer to this hotel
Fast elevators but hallways and rooms need to be updated
With wallpaper old bathroom gold fixtures and dated furniture the only thing lacking is mothballs to bring back memories of staying in grandmas spare bedroom
If you want a cocktail order from the dining room you will get it faster
Noises easily carry from adjacent rooms
1: Room was very nice and clean
Nice Hotel clean rooms and courteous staff
Close proximity to airport and rooms are in good shape
Room was very clean and updated as well as the rest of the amenities
Nice rooms at least on concierge floor
Great staff and clean rooms nice bars
